verbs.description: [ARG0: some police dogs] [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: have] [ARG1: cameras too cameras that transmit live video the devices generally attach to dogs backs on a vest and transmit video to a handler watching from a screen possibly on their wrist or around their necks it so the officers can better assess what they are up against before they go into a situation if we have a really close encounter with armed people it does n't work] out well for anyone said shawn gore portland oregon police k-9 officer if we can gain distance it gives us lots of options to negotiate and de - escalate tactical electronics jasko united states police canine association david ferland milwaukee portland associated press police gillian flaccus marketing director portland oregon wisconsin reporter shawn diedrich oregon executive director addie ventris portland police bureau portland police officer muskego police department shawn gore
